item.title: Introduction to Large Language Model
item.description:
LLM Architecture

Large Language Model (LLM)

  • Next token prediction

    • Feature and label are shifted by one token

    • Label: [batch size, seq len]

  • Data Source

    • Raw text data for pre-training
